title: Methods / Functions
concept: This level focuses on defining and calling methods in Java, returning values, passing parameters, using static methods and writing helper methods to organize logic.

challenges.title: Square using Method
challenges.description: Create a method square(int n) that returns n*n. Read n and print result.

challenges.title: Max of Two
challenges.description: Create method max2(int a,int b) that returns the larger of the two. If equal return either.

challenges.title: Factorial Method
challenges.description: Create factorial(int n) and compute n! using loop. Print result.

challenges.title: Prime Check using Method
challenges.description: Create isPrime(int n) that returns true if prime else false. Print Yes or No.

challenges.title: Reverse Number using Method
challenges.description: Create reverseNum(int n) that returns integer reversed.

challenges.title: Sum of Array using Method
challenges.description: Create sumArr(int[] arr) that returns sum of array elements.

challenges.title: GCD using Method
challenges.description: Create gcd(int a,int b) using Euclidean algorithm. Print result.

challenges.title: LCM using Method
challenges.description: Create lcm(int a,int b) that uses gcd inside and returns LCM.

challenges.title: Check Palindrome Number using Method
challenges.description: Create isPal(int n) that returns true if number is palindrome else false. Print Yes or No.

challenges.title: Mini Calculator (Methods)
challenges.description: Create methods add, sub, mul, div. Read a, b and operator (+ - * /). Print result. Division should be integer division.
